Does anyone here use/maintain the Paul P. wrld/rest implementation [1] ?
Is there a better/up to date  public package ?
(I know that Rest is just an architecture but some sample code could help,
to avoid re-inventing the wheel any time)



[1] http://www.prescod.net/rest/wrdl/
